Connecting to a Wi-Fi Network
Wi-Fi network connection supports multiple network types including certificate-based networks.

title: Profile Wizards
keywords: window displays wizard templates creating profiles profile creation drop-down offers mx versions * select zebra kitkat devices include stagenow client jelly bean older tc70 kit kat ship rapid deployment version selection saved subsequent [img]//images/wizardlist_mxdropdownjpg
summary:
This window displays the Wizard templates available for creating profiles and allows a Wizard for profile creation. 

The drop-down offers three MX versions for profile creation:

MX 5.0 - Select this for Zebra KitKat devices, which include the StageNow Client.

About This Help

StageNow 2.2 User Guide, Revision A

P/N MN-002672-01

 Introduction
This help file provides the staging administrator instructions on using StageNow 2.2 to create profiles to use for staging devices.

title: Network.WLAN.Android
keywords: ## networkwlanandroid ### overview setting type configures wlan settings android devices main functionality * disable profiles option access point essid set network profile encryption
summary:
About Network.WLAN.Android

 Overview
The Network.WLAN.Android setting type configures the WLAN settings on Android devices.

Main Functionality

Disable all other profiles.

title: Network.WLAN.Android.FusionOptions
keywords: ## networkwlanandroidfusionoptions ### overview networkwlanandroid setting type defines wlan settings android devices staging main functionality * 80211d option enable user select country code rf band
summary:
About Network.WLAN.Android.FusionOptions

 Overview
The Network.WLAN.Android setting type defines the WLAN settings on Android devices during staging.

summary:
About Network.WWAN.GPRS

 Overview
The Network.WWAN.GPRS setting type defines the WWAN data connection settings on GPRS-enabled devices during staging.

Introduction
This section provides information on the StageNow Android staging solution, including an explanation of staging, its purposes, and users.
